definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
lit. plucking a branch of osmanthus from the Toad Palace (i.e. the moon)/fig. to succeed in the imperial examination

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the regulatory effects of bombesin on the activities of disaccharidase in the intestinal mucosal cells in neonatal rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨铃蟾肽对新生兔小肠黏膜双糖酶活性的影响。

sentences.english: Ji can live a listen to spittor fortune, he said that he can stay.
sentences.chinese: 纪住一听金蟾能招财，便说他可以留下来了。

sentences.english: And that was the last individual ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 那是最后一次看见单独出现的金蟾。

sentences.english: His experiment involved a species of toad called the Midwife Toad.
sentences.chinese: 他的实验由一种被称为产婆蟾的蟾蜍完成。

sentences.english: Atrazine had no toxicity to the survival and growth of X. laevis .
sentences.chinese: 阿特拉津对非洲爪蟾的生存和发育则没有明显影响。

sentences.english: The tissue and cell in digestive tract of Bombina orientalis were studied by histological method.
sentences.chinese: 采用组织学方法对东方铃蟾的消化道进行了研究。

sentences.english: Liupanshan sudden tooth laevis as one of the items rare animals unique to China.
sentences.chinese: 六盘山突齿蟾为中国特有珍稀动物品目之一。

sentences.english: Besides being ugly, the Oyster toadfish has the distinction of having one of its own go into space.
sentences.chinese: 除了相貌丑陋之外，毒棘豹蟾鱼曾经还进入过太空。

sentences.english: Dead male common midwife toads lie on the ground in France's Pyrenees National Park.
sentences.chinese: 死亡的雄性产婆蟾躺在法国庇里牛斯山国家公园。

sentences.english: ConclusionChantui should be regarded as a new officinal part of Bufo bufo gargarizans Cantor.
sentences.chinese: 结论蟾蜕应为药用动物蟾蜍的一个新的药用部位。

definition: a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
wild beast/wild horse/lion/trad. form used erroneously for 貌/simplified form used erroneously for 狻
